text: Eka#vi(gm)SatyAq mAShai$H puruShaSIqrq.Sha-macCai$tyamEqddhyA vai mAShA# amEqddhyaM pu#ruShaSIqrq.Sha-ma#mEqddhyairEqvA-syA#-mEqddhyaM ni#ravaqdAyaq mEddhya#M kRuqtvA &&ha#raqtyEka#vi(gm)Sati-rBavantyEkaviq(gm)qSO vai puru#ShaqH puru#ShaqsyA&&*ptyaiq vyRu#ddhaqM ~MvA Eqtat prAqNaira#mEqddhyaM ~Myat pu#ruShaSIqrq.Sha(gm) sa#ptaqdhA vitRu#NNAM ~MvalmIkavaqpAM pratiq ni da#dhAti saqpta vai SI#r.ShaqNyA$H prAqNAH prAqNairEqvainaqth-sama#d^^rdhayati mEddhyaqtvAyaq yAva#ntOq - [  ] 39
